Dear Valve, I want to say THANK YOU for making a VERY FUN GAME!! Over the past 12 years, I have made great memories playing HL2. You've also helped me in the saddest parts of my life, like when my Grandpa and I used to have fun watching each other play HL2. We were VERY close. i don't really do much Online stuff (or even do Social media because it\s TOO TOXIC!!) Anyway, I just wanna thank you for helping me make fun memories and wish you luck.

Ну хз... Первая половина игры была интересная, после пошли какие-то скучные главы и немного затянутые. Насчёт концовки тоже хз. Никаких эмоций не вызвала. Я понимаю какой вклад Half-Life привнесла в индустрию. Но после середины игры, проходил уже чисто для галочки. Мб в 2004 это и смотрелось круто, но сейчас это не впечатляет. Дело даже не в графике, она меня вполне устраивает. Сюжет не особо понравился. Тут уже на вкус и цвет :) В общем, ценю какой вклад игра сделала для индустрии. Но проходить ещё раз, не. А если не играли, один раз можно пройти, чисто для ознакомления.

Honestly there really is not any other game that comes close to capturing the feel and experience that Half-Life 2 brings. A depressing yet rich atmosphere, a gripping story, a beautiful world that still holds up 16 years later, and throughout it all you play as a theoretical physicist that barrages enemies with a variety of unique guns, a crowbar, and a gravity-gun that allows you to pick up objects and fling them at enemies (my personal favorite). If you have not played this game yet, you're missing out on one of the best FPS experiences of all time.
Its Half Life

Half-Life 2 von Valve ist und bleibt ein nicht wegzudenkender Meilenstein in der Computerspielegeschichte. Ein Ego-Shooter der ganz besonderen Art. Eine packende Story und unbeschreibliche Physik. Volle Kaufempfehlung. Vorallem nach dem Ende vom neuen VR-Spiel Half-Life Alyx ist dieses Universum wieder voll in Fahrt und interessanter denn je.

어릴때 깨는데 포로토타입보다 존나 오래걸렸다. 이유는 이런게임장르가 첨이다보니 길찾는데 백만년이 걸렸고 그때의 에임은 키마로해도 지금의 패드보다 못한 에임이였기에 이게임은 둠 하드난이도보다 어려웠다.

그때당시 이게임이 잼있던 이유는 이러한 게임이 이것밖에 있는줄 몰랐다는 점과 스토리가 있는 FPS는 첨하기 떄문이였다.

그당시의 기분을 느끼기 위해서 다시켜봤다.

이시발 원래 이게임 멀미가 심했나 다시할수가없네

One of the best FPS titles of all time, bar none. Worth a revisit for old fans, and if you're new to the series it still holds up surprisingly well with a robust narrative and world that pulls you in along with great shooting mechanics. But the real selling point here is the story line and the world building that draws you in for hours.

MUCH better than the first. Definitely worth full price, but it goes on sale for like, a buck during most big events.

Half-Life 2 is a truly amazing FPS: If you've played HL1, you'll love it, and if you haven't played it, you'll still love HL2. This game has tons of fun physics puzzles and when you figure them out on your own it feels very satisfying. The gameplay is great, you have a nice selection of weapons and the story is amazing.

[h1] Najlepsza fabularna gra od Valve, czyli Half Life 2 [/h1]

Half Life 2 przenosi nas do historii Gordona Freemana, tak tego samego gościa, co z half life. I no muszę przyznać, że half-life 2 jest naprawdę super, scenariusz, mechanika, przeciwnicy, teraz już wiem z czego się do wszystko wzięło. Bronie, szczególnie stary dobry half-life'owy łom oraz działo grawitacji, świat oraz styl gry sprawiają, że Half-life 2 jest jedną z najpopularniejszych pierwszoosobowych fps'ów w historii. Valve odwaliło świetną robotę robiąc również Half-life epizode 1-2, czyli ostateczny pojedynek i kontynuację zakończenia najlepszego, czyli half-life'a 2. Postacie mi się też podobają oraz dialogi, są całkiem dobre. 

Nie grałem w Half-Life 2 w starych czasach, ale dużo o nim słyszałem, kupiłem za kilka (zł), ograłem i stwierdzam, że Half-Life 2 zasługuje na 8,5/10.

i am gordon freeman

What are you doing with your life if you play PC games and you haven't played this? This game universe raised a generation of video game lovers. It shook and inspired the entire industry surrounding it spanning all the way from the first Half-Life release and its influence is still seen in titles today

If you can make it through this game... even in 2020... and it doesn't raise your standards or expectations of story driven shooters... or if it doesn't make you want more and more of this universe... or if it doesn't move or affect you on some emotional level... then you are dead inside.

The passage of time has left this absolute rock of a game untarnished. The passion put into Half-Life 2 bleeds out from every corner. The story grips at your heart, the gameplay is pure (no grinds or exp needed), and if you want to play the best of the best then Half-Life 2 needs to be in your library.

Get this game and jam it into your eye holes already. Stop reading reviews to decide, fuck you, buy it.

This is one of the best games I've ever played.
From the well-known G-Man speech at the start of the game to blowing up the Citadel,I enjoyed every part of this game. Even Ravenholm,which even though scared the hell out of me,was a bloody masterpiece.
The graphics hold up pretty well for a game released in 2004 in my opinion,which is incredible.
If you never played this game, I don't know what in the world you're waiting for: Just. Play. It
